ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] RE: Test Problem fixed
ygData.msgSnippet: Beats me what a chad is (aside from the name of a few guys I went to school with).  I still drive down the road to flip the little switches then pull the lever
ygData.messageBody:
Beats me what a chad is (aside from the name of a few guys I went to school
with). I still drive down the road to flip the little switches then pull
the lever on the machine that's been in use since the late 1800's ;o)

-=B=-
The Rathe
----- Original Message -----
From: "Qaelan" <qaelan@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 14, 2000 3:30 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] RE: Test Problem fixed


> Something that still amazes me is that you yanks have a choice, i have
seen
> many threads on usenet saying.. "are you going to vote?" over here, come
> election time, if you dont vote its a $100 fine or a stay at one of Her
> Majesty's lovely hotels.
>
> That said... we still tick a box with an X, i mean what the hell is a chad
> anyway? :)
>
